Operation.xpath:
Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="V_BaseChargeWeapon" or @ParentName="BaseGunBlade" or @ParentName="BaseShortGunBlade" or @ParentName="BaseEltexGunBlade" or defName="V_AnimaHammer" or defName="V_AnimaStaff" or defName="V_AnimaMace" or defName="V_AnimaDagger" or defName="V_AnimaLongSword" or defName="V_AnimaKatana" or defName="V_AnimaSpearLance"
]

mods.li: No Man Sky Heavy Weapon Pack
FCP Children of Atom Equipment Teaser

Operation.xpath: Defs/ThingDef[(contains(defName, "CodZP_") or contains(defName, "CODZP_")) and (@ParentName="CODZP_BaseWonderWeaponSharp" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseWonderPackAPunchSharp" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseWonderWeaponBlunt" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseWonderPackAPunchBlunt" or @ParentName="CODZP_BasePackAPunchGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseUncraftablePackAPunch" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseWonderWeaponGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_BasePAPWonderWeaponGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseUncraftableWonderGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_UncraftablePAPWonderGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseAmmoMaticGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_BaseWonderAmmoMaticGun" or @ParentName="CODZP_BasePAPWonderAmmoMaticGun")]

Defs/ThingDef[contains(defName, "AJ_") and (@ParentName="BaseWeaponNeolithic" or @ParentName="BaseHumanMakeableGun" or @ParentName="BaseMakeableGrenade" or @ParentName="BaseMeleeWeapon_Blunt_Quality" or @ParentName="BaseMeleeWeapon_Sharp_Quality")]
